EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Survival is not Mandatory CNJ Minneapolis_Q217.Reminder Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Survival is not Mandatory: Cloud-Native Java with Josh Long | Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow, July 11th, at the Survival is not Mandatory: Cloud-Native Java event at Object Partners in Minneapolis tomorrow. This is a reminder to leave your laptop at home and enjoy the live coding with Pivotal's Josh Long. Parking is located behind the building.
We hope you are able to stick around after for some food from the Gastrotruck, local craft brew and to meet Josh!
Date: Tuesday, July 11, 2017
Time:
12:45PM to 6:00PM
Location: Object Partners 1515 Central Ave. NE, Suite 100 Minneapolis, MN, 55413 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/1515+Central+Ave+NE+%23100,+Minneapolis,+MN+55413/@45.0039529,-93.2482474,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x52b32d965c06ad57:0x8facb6fbe9a8eb47!8m2!3d45.0039529!4d-93.2460587]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email Matt Nelson at mnelson@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mnelson@pivotal.io]]>.
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/Survival-is-not-Mandatory-CNJ-Minneapolis.html]]>
